snippet: With Mitt Romney's opponents slamming private equity as "vultures" and job destroyers, the industry is bracing for "more pain," report Peter Lattman and Annie Lowrey of The New York Times. Read more »
abstract: With Mitt Romney's opponents slamming private equity as "vultures" and job destroyers, the industry is bracing for "more pain," report Peter Lattman and Annie Lowrey of The New York Times. Read more »
lead_paragraph: With Mitt Romney's opponents slamming private equity firms as "vultures" and job destroyers, the industry is bracing for "more pain," report Peter Lattman and Annie Lowrey of The New York Times. Read more »

headline.main: Romney's Campaign Raises Private Equity Debate
